Thanks for looking.  As you can see, the image is extremely clear and focused and the contrast is as nice as you'll find.  Apparent on the scan of the back is a horizontal crease.  Not sure how it would grade, but it's still a beautiful N172 example of a potential HOFer.  SOLD!!


Thanks again,

Craig
